pr_title: #4182, ignore showLike context in show columns

timeline.message: #4182, ignore showLike context in show columns
#4182, ignore showLike context in show columns

timeline.bodyText:
showLike_ and showLike can make developer confuse.
It is better to rename showLike_ to showColumnLike_.
